item.description:
The DSM (Diagnostic and Statistics Manual of Mental Disorders)
with Linda Marks, MSM


The DSM can be considered by some as either "bible" for mental health providers or a "naturalist's field guide" to others. This manual definitions all the classifications of "mental disorders," and is the basis for getting insurance coverage for psychotherapy, and sometimes other medical conditions with a psychological dimensionality.

Linda will provide an overview of the history of the DSM, what is has evolved into, how it is used today, and key issues under consideration as DSM-V is being developed for publication in 2013. Whether you actually need to know diagnoses for work with your clients or not, understanding what the DSM is and how it is used is a useful backdrop for any mind-body health professional.

Linda Marks, MSM, has practiced body psychotherapy with individuals, couples, groups and families for 25 years. She founded the Institute for EKP and trains psychotherapists, bodyworkers and other health professionals in the heart-centered, psychospiritual body psychotherapy method she developed and practices. Linda also practices mediation and coaching as part of her commitment to help people create and sustain mutually empowering relationships. www.healingheartpower.com

We begin with a potluck lunch at 11:30 am and move to our presentation at 12:30 pm. Let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.

$10 meetup fee.
item.name: November Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
